SELECT t11.tagNum, t11.roomName, COUNT(t11.roomName) AS roomNum FROM (SELECT ti1.tagNum, ti1.NAME, t03.roomName FROM TagInformation ti1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t01.tagNum, ri1.roomName FROM time t01, ( SELECT max(id) AS max_id, tagNum FROM time GROUP BY tagNum ) t02, RoomInformation ri1 WHERE t01.id = t02.max_id AND t01.cpid = ri1.cpid AND t01.wakeupNum = ri1.wakeupNum ) t03 ON ti1.TagNum = t03.tagNum WHERE ti1.Usefull = 'true' ORDER BY ti1.tagNum
) t11 GROUP BY t11.roomName
